__e: - Talk has it that you're the Montana Kid.
Oh, Miss Adell, I reckon we're lookin' at the Montana Kid.
The last couple of years she was alive, she was working as a waitress in Ennis, Montana, and I would beg her not to leave, and every day, I would cry;
Always great to be back in Montana and see all of our friends.
He was away when I was a kid but they told me he was in Montana being a cowboy.
